name: Elena Rodriguez
bio: Award-winning director with major label collaborations, specializing in Latin music and reggaeton visuals. Known for vibrant aesthetics with dynamic camera movements that capture the heat and passion of Latin culture.
experience: Award-winning director with major label collaborations

visual_style.description: Vibrant aesthetics with dynamic camera movements, tropical colors, sensual choreography, cultural celebration
signature_techniques: Slow-motion hair flips and dance moves

camera_preferences.shot_composition: Dynamic asymmetry, subjects in motion, foreground/background layers
camera_preferences.camera_notes: Constantly moving camera, fluid motions following dancers, circling subjects

lighting_style.color_temperature: Warm 3200K-4000K mixed with cool blue accents
key_techniques: Natural golden hour for beach scenes
lighting_style.mood_lighting: Vibrant, saturated, warm with pops of cool contrast, lots of haze for depth

editing_style.pace: Fast-paced with rhythm synchronization to reggaeton beat
editing_style.rhythm_approach: Cuts locked to dembow rhythm, emphasizing bass drops and snare hits

storytelling.narrative_approach: Party atmosphere with sensual performance, cultural celebration, beach/club lifestyle
storytelling.symbolism_level: Medium - uses dance, tropical imagery, and cultural symbols

post_production.color_grading_style: Vibrant saturation, warm skin tones, teal and orange contrast, lifted blacks
post_production.vfx_approach: Light VFX for enhancement - motion graphics, color pops, subtle effects

key_priorities: Tropical and beach environments, nightclub settings
Vibrant red, orange, and turquoise color palette
